dc_description_s: This datalayer shows the location of 1,903 public and 642 private schools, pre-school through high school, in Massachusetts. This data was developed by the Massachusetts Department of Environmental Protectionâ€™s (DEP) GIS Program based on database information provided by the Massachusetts Department of Education (DOE) through the following contact: Carolyn Faria 350 Main Street Malden, MA (781) 338-3000 cfaria@doe.mass.edu
